nodes.bodyText: Not saying this is wrong, but I don't understand it: why does it change from Leap15.1 to Leap? Shouldn't it be Leap15.2?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +23,7 @@ artifacts:
     repository: Uyuni_Other
   - artifact: cglib
     jar: cglib.jar
-    repository: Leap15.1
+    repository: Leap

nodes.bodyText: Leap is the alias for the latest Leap repo which is 15.2 in this case. If you want to rename it, feel free to do it :)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +23,7 @@ artifacts:
     repository: Uyuni_Other
   - artifact: cglib
     jar: cglib.jar
-    repository: Leap15.1
+    repository: Leap

nodes.bodyText: No, now that I you told, it makes sense. Most likely you already documented it for obs-to-maven and I am just not familiar with it :-)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +23,7 @@ artifacts:
     repository: Uyuni_Other
   - artifact: cglib
     jar: cglib.jar
-    repository: Leap15.1
+    repository: Leap

nodes.bodyText: The standard Leap is actually 15.2, see here. This way we only need to change it in one place when 15.3 comes.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +23,7 @@ artifacts:
     repository: Uyuni_Other
   - artifact: cglib
     jar: cglib.jar
-    repository: Leap15.1
+    repository: Leap
